title: What are some fun Tank supports to play?
body:
I mostly play Sona, Rakan, and smaller amounts of Brand and Lux, and I've tried playing tank supports but every time I try someone who I'm interested in playing, I feel really slow and weak, not really threatening unlike someone like chogath or rammus, and I would like to be protective and leap into a fight if I'm far away, like Galio (hopefully after the hotfix he won't be banned as often).

But I digress

But for those who play tanks often, which are the more fun tank supports to wreak havoc with in the bot lane?
